content: Very new to the FHIR/HAPI ecosystem so hopefully an easy question — I'm running a docker image of the HAPI server and am trying to find the best way to point it to our custom FHIR resources; noticed that the dropdown on the homepage points to either local testing or public testing, but can't figure out where that lives in code. Is this simpler than I'm thinking?
To clarify, I have a custom build of http://hl7.org/fhir/ and want to point to that versus a built-in test build. Am I completely misunderstanding how this works?
Solved this issue — following up here for posterity.
